description: This notification is generated when the MAC limit for
given routing instance (jnxl2aldRoutingInst) is reached.
This trap is send only once we exceed the limit value.

event.Summary: MAC address limit exceeded for routing instance $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldRoutingInstMacLimit JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldLogicalRouter.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldRoutingInst.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldBridgeDomain.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldMacLimit.585 u 9999

description: The logical router string for routing mac limit trap.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldLogicalRouter

description: The Routing instance string for routing mac limit trap.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldRoutingInst

description: The bridge domain string for routing mac limit trap.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldBridgeDomain

description: The mac limit count for routing instance.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldMacLimit

description: This notification is generated when the MAC limit for
the given physical interface (jnxl2aldInterfaceMacLimit) is reached.
This trap is send only once we exceed the limit value.

event.Summary: MAC address limit exceeded for physical interface $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldInterfaceMacLimit JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfLogicalRouter.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfRoutingInst.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfBridgeDomain.585 s EXAMPLE IF-MIB::ifDescr.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfMacLimit.585 u 9999

description: The logical router string for interface table.

description: The routing instance string for interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfRoutingInst

description: The bridge domain string for interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfBridgeDomain

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The MAC limit count for the interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfMacLimit

description: This notification is generated when the MAC limit for
the entire system is reached.
This trap is send only once we exceed the limit value.

event.Summary: MAC address limit exceeded for the entire system

description: The mac limit count for the system.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldGbMacLimit

description: This notification is generated when a mac move reaches threshold.
The given interface (ifDescr) will be blocked for the Bridge
Domain(jnxl2aldIntfBridgeDomain). This trap is send only once when
mac move count exceeds the threshold for the Mac(jnxl2aldMacAdress).

event.Summary: MAC move threshold exceeded for MAC address $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldMacMoveThreshold JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfLogicalRouter.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfRoutingInst.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfBridgeDomain.585 s EXAMPLE IF-MIB::ifDescr.99.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldMacAdress.585 s EXAMPLE

description: The logical router string for interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfLogicalRouter

description: The routing instance string for interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfRoutingInst

description: The bridge domain string for interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfBridgeDomain

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The offending mac causing mac move threshold trap.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldMacAdress

description: This notification is generated when there is enough MAC
address information to fully occupy a maximum size SNMP trap
message. This notification is also generated when there
is at least one MAC address changed or removed and the amount
of time elapsed from the previous notification is greater
than the maximum wait time denoted by
jnxNotificationInterval object.
If there are more MAC addresses information than can fit into
one cmmHistTrapContent object, then multiple notifications
will be generated.

event.Summary: At least one MAC address was changed or removed

description: This object contains the information of a MAC change
notification event. It consists of several tuples packed
together in the format of '<tuple1><tuple2>...'.
Each tuple consist of 13 octets in the format of
'<operation><VLAN INDEX><MAC><dot1dBasePort><VLAN TAG>' where
<operation> is of size 1 octet and supports the following values
0 - End of MIB object.
1 - MAC learnt.
2 - MAC removed.
3 - MAC updated.
<VLAN INDEX> is the index of the VLAN which the MAC address is
belonged to and has size of 2 octet.
<MAC> is the Layer2 Mac Address and has size of 6 octets.
<dot1dBasePort> is the value of dot1dBasePort for the
interface from which the MAC address is learnt and has size
of 2 octets.
<VLAN TAG> is the tag of the VLAN which the MAC address is
belonged to and has size of 2 octet.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxL2aldHistMacChangedMsg

description: The value of sysUpTime when the jnxL2aldMacChangedNotification
containing the information denoted by the jnxHistMacChangedMsg
object in this entry was generated.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxL2aldHistTimestamp

description: This notification is generated for discarding packets in a bridge domain over an
IFL for MACs when learned over MAC pinning enabled interface and same MACs are
also seen over any other interfaces in the same bridge domain.
This trap is generated in configured interval of time when packets are discarded
over an IFL continuously.

event.Summary: Packets discarded in bridge domain $v3 over IFL $v6 due to MAC pinning on IFL $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldMacPinningdiscard JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfLogicalRouter.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfRoutingInst.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfBridgeDomain.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldMacAdress.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfMacPinningIntf.585 s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfDiscardIntf.585 s EXAMPLE

description: The logical router string for interface table.

description: The routing instance string for interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfRoutingInst

description: The bridge domain string for interface table.
variables.name: JUNIPER-L2ALD-MIB::jnxl2aldIntfBridgeDomain

description: The offending mac causing mac move threshold trap.

description: The interface on which MAC Pinning is enabled.
